title: Chetek man dies in apparent accidental shooting
content:
BARRON, Wis. (WEAU) -- Investigators say that it appears a Chetek man accidentally shot himself to death.
On Wednesday, the Barron County Sheriff's Office said officers found the body of Paul Rederer, 25, on Tuesday night. A caller had reported that a person shot himself on Leonard Street in Chetek. Law enforcement and first responders arrived at the scene and found Rederer. Investigators believe alcohol and drug use were contributing factors.
The sheriff's office, Chetek Police Department and Barron County Medical Examiner’s Office are investigating the circumstances surrounding Rederer's death.
